t: Beauty Brands Draw the Line Between Dupes and Fakes on Amazon | BoF
s: October 3, 2024 - Brands say they have a lot of hoops to jump through in order to get Amazon to take listings down. To make the case for a takedown, brands need to make sure they have trade dress protection on their aesthetic and design patents on their packaging design.
